authentication.beginCreateFirstUser: Per iniziare, crea il tuo primo utente.
authentication.checkYourEmailForPasswordReset: Controlla la tua email e clicca sul link che ti permetterà di cambiare in sicurezza la tua password.
authentication.forgotPasswordEmailInstructions: Inserisci la tua mail qui sotto. Riceverai un messaggio email con le istruzioni su come cambiare la tua password.
authentication.generatingNewAPIKeyWillInvalidate: Generando una nuova chiave API si <1>invaliderà</1> la chiave precedente. Sei sicuro di voler continuare?
authentication.loggedIn: Per accedere con un altro utente, devi prima <0>uscire</0>.
authentication.loggedInChangePassword: Per cambiare la tua password, vai al tuo <0>account</0> e modifica la tua password lì.
authentication.loggedOutInactivity: Sei stato disconnesso automaticamente per inattività.
authentication.loginWithAnotherUser: Per accedere con un altro utente, devi prima <0>uscire</0>.
authentication.newAccountCreated:
Un nuovo account è appena stato creato per te per accedere a <0>{{serverURL}} Clicca sul seguente link o incolla l'URL qui sotto nel browser per verificare la tua email: <1>{{verificationURL}}
Dopo aver verificato la tua email, sarai in grado di effettuare il log in con successo.
authentication.youAreInactive: Non sei attivo da un po' di tempo e a breve verrai disconnesso automaticamente per la tua sicurezza. Vuoi rimanere connesso?
authentication.youAreReceivingResetPassword: Ricevi questo messaggio perché tu (o qualcun altro) hai richiesto la reimpostazione della password per il tuo account. Clicca sul seguente link o incollalo nel browser per completare il processo:
authentication.youDidNotRequestPassword: Se non l'hai richiesto, ignora questa email e la tua password rimarrà invariata.

error.accountAlreadyActivated: This account has already been activated.
error.autosaving: There was a problem while autosaving this document.
error.deletingTitle: There was an error while deleting {{title}}. Please check your connection and try again.
error.emailOrPasswordIncorrect: The email or password provided is incorrect.
error.loadingDocument: There was a problem loading the document with ID of {{id}}.
error.missingIDOfDocument: Missing ID of document to update.
error.notAllowedToAccessPage: You are not allowed to access this page.
error.notAllowedToPerformAction: You are not allowed to perform this action.
error.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
error.problemUploadingFile: There was a problem while uploading the file.
error.tokenInvalidOrExpired: Token is either invalid or has expired.
error.unPublishingDocument: There was a problem while un-publishing this document.
error.unauthorized: Unauthorized, you must be logged in to make this request.
error.userLocked: This user is locked due to having too many failed login attempts.

general.aboutToDelete: You are about to delete the {{label}} <1>{{title}}</1>. Are you sure?
general.changesNotSaved: Your changes have not been saved. If you leave now, you will lose your changes.
general.noResults: No {{label}} found. Either no {{label}} exist yet or none match the filters you've specified above.
general.sorryNotFound: Sorry—there is nothing to correspond with your request.
general.unsavedChangesDuplicate: You have unsaved changes. Would you like to continue to duplicate?

upload.dragAndDropHere: or drag and drop a file here

validation.atLeastOneRow: This field requires at least one row.
validation.emailAddress: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.greaterThanMax: "{{value}}" is greater than the max allowed value of {{max}}.
validation.invalidInput: This field has an invalid input.
validation.invalidSelection: This field has an invalid selection.
validation.invalidSelections: 'This field has the following invalid selections:'
validation.lessThanMin: "{{value}}" is less than the min allowed value of {{min}}.
validation.longerThanMin: This value must be longer than the minimum length of {{minLength}} characters.
validation.maxRows: This field requires no more than {{maxRows}} row(s).
validation.minRows: This field requires at least {{minRows}} row(s).
validation.requiresOneRow: This field requires at least one row.
validation.shorterThanMax: This value must be shorter than the max length of {{maxLength}} characters.
validation.trueOrFalse: This field can only be equal to true or false.
validation.validUploadID: 'This field is not a valid upload ID.'

version.aboutToRestore: You are about to restore this {{label}} document to the state that it was in on {{versionDate}}.
version.aboutToRestoreGlobal: You are about to restore the global {{label}} to the state that it was in on {{versionDate}}.
version.aboutToRevertToPublished: You are about to revert this document's changes to its published state. Are you sure?
version.aboutToUnpublish: You are about to unpublish this document. Are you sure?
version.problemRestoringVersion: There was a problem restoring this version
